import React from "react"; import "./Contact.css"; import emailjs from "emailjs-com"; import { GitHub, Instagram, LinkedIn } from "@material-ui/icons"; const Contact = () => { function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_ydnq01s", "template_mc8lvzk", e.target, "user_CwNptdn7yDUpmXHZDgVci" ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); e.target.reset(); } return (

Contact Me

window.open( "https://www.linkedin.com/in/ankit-dhawan-17b552161/", "_blank" ) } /> window.open("https://github.com/ad-dhawan", "_blank") } /> window.open("https://www.instagram.com/dhawan.exe/", "_blank") } />
); }; export default Contact;
